episode_event_ch0338_photo/4001_1001_020:
This might be kinda sudden, but are you
interested in photography?
episode_event_ch0338_photo/4001_1001_030:
I ask because photo missions are now
available on Pasio!
episode_event_ch0338_photo/4001_1001_040:
To complete them, just take a photo of
whatever the mission specifies!
episode_event_ch0338_photo/4001_1001_060: So grab a camera and have fun!
